comment: Note that you have maybe one person on Gab who can post intelligently about evolution for every thousand young Earth creationists. This is normal in the low end of the GOP distribution. Gab is not attracting the best.
amr:
# ::snt Note that you have maybe one person on Gab who can post intelligently about evolution for every thousand young Earth creationists. This is normal in the low end of the GOP distribution. Gab is not attracting the best.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (n / note-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (h / have-03
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :quant 1
                              :ARG0-of (p3 / post-01
                                    :ARG2 (p4 / publication
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Gab"))
                                    :ARG1-of (ii / intelligent-01)
                                    :beneficiary (p5 / person
                                          :mod (y2 / young)
                                          :ARG0-of (c / create-01
                                                :ARG1 (p6 / planet
                                                      :name (n3 / name
                                                            :op1 "Earth")))
                                          :quant (e / every
                                                :op1 1000)))
                              :ARG1-of (p7 / possible-01)))))
      :snt2 (n4 / normal-02
            :ARG1 (t / this)
            :location (e2 / end
                  :ARG2-of (l / low-04
                        :ARG1 (d / distribute-01
                              :ARG0 (p8 / political-party
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "GOP"))))))
      :snt3 (a / attract-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p9 / product
                  :name (n6 / name
                        :op1 "Gab"))
            :ARG1 (p10 / person
                  :ARG1-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (g / good-03
                              :ARG1 p9)
                        :ARG3 (m2 / most)))))
